column4: Hi all, is there some programming languages like visual basic 6.0, in linux ? which is easy to create softwares ???
but that is a scripting language. i need some GUI Application Developement languages ???
are you sure this software isn't in the repositories?
go to system -> tools -> administration, and see if the software you want to install is listed there, if it is ,just  double click it and press apply
just find the apache2 package in the package manager and install it
